laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Blood routines (haemogram, renal and liver profiles, electrolytes, vitamin B12 levels, glycaemic status, and thyroid levels)
Cervical and ocular vestibular evoked myogenic potential (VEMP) test
laboratory_examinations.findings: Right more than left dysfunction with bilateral prolonged P13 latency.
Bilateral moderate to severe sensorineural hearing loss.
Protein level of 80.8 (N<45g/dL), no cells, glucose level of 93.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Cerebrospinal fluid infective and immune workup
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for cytology and antineuronal antibody panels. Viral markers non-reactive.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Repeat gadolinium-enhanced MRI of the brain

laboratory_examinations.findings: Reduced caloric response bilaterally (sum of bithermal max. peak slow phase velocity at 2.65Â°/s).
